## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run `dotnet format` on my changes

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have manually tested the changes in the UI (if applicable)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation (if needed)
- [ ] I have added XML comments to new public APIs (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated ROADMAP.md (if implementing a planned feature)

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have documented any new dependencies in the PR description
- [ ] Dependencies are necessary and appropriate for this change

### Database Changes (if applicable)

- [ ] I have tested migration up and down
